website_summaries.verdict: This is an excellent noise-canceling headphone, but if Samsung-owned AKG wants to see it on more people's heads, it's going to have to lower its price to create some separation from top models from Bose and Sony.
pros: The AKG N700NC sounds excellent for a wireless noise-canceling headphone, is built sturdily and is comfortable to wear
Its noise-canceling is quite effective and there's an Ambient Aware feature that lets you hear the outside world
cons: Not quite as comfortable as competing models from Sony and Bose
Its case is a little big

customer_reviews.title: Left headphone went out after 2 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: This product become defective after two months of light use - the left headphone no longer has active noise cancellation or play any audio. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation was pretty good - have 3 boys and it definitely doesn't drown everything out, but does a valent effort in attempting to! Thought the color was going to be darker, but it is a bright silver. Ear pieces fit exactly around my ears, which is very comfortable compared to ear buds. Sound quality is good. Cord to actually connect (ie when I want them connected to my computer audio instead of bluetooth to my phone) is extremely short, so I wouldn't suggest these as a work headset. Overall, nice headset, good quality, and will definitely continue to use over ear-pods.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and ears and I always found over ear headphones very uncomfortable. The cups on these are large enough to go around my ear comfortably creating an excellent seal for the noise cancellation. As others have stated, the audio quality is FAR better in bluetooth mode. The app also lets you control auto shut off times, custom equalizers, and what a special button does; I use it for the ambient passthrough feature. The case is sturdy and of good quality, the charging and auxiliary cables are pretty wimpy, but the headphones themselves feel excellent and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Surprisingly great for gaming also!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are premiere in more than one way. The fact that they are noise canceling and Bluetooth is hardly the best thing. The cushions are soft & the ergonomic design makes them very comfortable. They are so comfortable that I use the aux cord and started using them for gaming. The features are great but the comfort alone is a game changer (pun Intended).
customer_reviews.author: ART1E

customer_reviews.title: Where is the microphone mute button?
customer_reviews.text: I will change my rating if anyone can answer. Even the manufacturer ignored my question about this. Not very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Charging issues in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Neutral sound signature and high quality sound. Respectable noise cancellation for the price. Cons - Cheaply made and looks very fragile. Looks are very odd - something like robocop or a character of a science fiction movie of 80's. High clamping force - starts hurting after 30 mins of usage. Battery life not so great i am not getting more than 12 hrs. Try to increase bass with equalizer, the sound is distorted. Charging pin seems to be fishy. Stopped charging after 2 weeks even though the charging indicator is lit up. After fiddling around, started charging again. Now, charging is a hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: Kranthi

customer_reviews.title: Stress Relievers
customer_reviews.text: I am an official AKG INSIDER of the N700 headphones and they are absolutely amazing, they come of great use when I'm aggravated and need a short break from my 5 kids, as those of you with children are familiar with. They have many features one of my favorite is that they can be used wired or wireless/ Bluetooth compatible. They are extremely comfortable around the ear, extend to your fit/size. The sound quality is unbelievably seamless.
customer_reviews.author: Dpwells90

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love them. I thought the battery broke. Apparently, you need the cable connected to have the turn on. They don’t feel secure to me. I enjoyed my Bose better, but didn’t want to have them connected to Alexa. I can’t buy the ones I really loved new again. These work. The NC is fine. I don’t love them. All things known, I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion NE

customer_reviews.title: Painful to get it working
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a free item with my Galaxy s10+ purchase and it has nothing but pain to use. first of all, there is no voice feedback from the headphone like some other brands like Bose QuietComfort, so you don't really know what's battery status/what's the pairing status, etc. secondly this was painful to connect to my devices, I had to retry at least 3-4 times to pair with my Mac as well as with my phone. Also even when I recharge the device all night it often denies powering up. If it was not in a combo deal with Samsung phone, I'd return it with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Nalin Ranjan

customer_reviews.title: Questionable life span
customer_reviews.text: Headphones worked great... for 6 months. The sound was good. ANC was good. Battery life was great (lasted 15hrs from LAX to Hong Kong) but alas the honeymoon period is over and 6 months into ownership the left speaker crackled a couple times and then stopped working. Alway kept in the travel case unless they were on my head so it’s not a case of mistreatment. Now I get to see how well their warranty process works.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones...
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but better than some others. Sound is very good, Nice fit for the most part but could be better to hold tighter on your head. Battery life is very good. Noise cancellation is very good but if ear cups were a little bit bigger and would knock out even more outside noise but not a deal breaker. Have been very satisfied with the headphones!
customer_reviews.author: C. Heine

customer_reviews.title: Akg n700nc
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing it's very natural sound , easy to connect to the phone , the headphone materials are ok , sound quality five stars , comfort three Stars after four hours of use and compare to new Sony headphone wh1000m3 disided to get the Sony .
customer_reviews.author: Aasim

customer_reviews.title: No ear pain
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the negative reviews and disagree. Noise cancelling is great. I have very sensitive ears and ear cartilage and I wore these for over 2 hours without any pain.
customer_reviews.author: JustLiz

customer_reviews.title: The AKG N700NC headphones won't work with any Apple computers
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but the N700NC is just a waste of time. The AKG N700NC headphones won't work with any Apple computers. AKG should be ashamed of selling these without first notifying you about this rather big lack of ability. Their tech support will ask you what version of Windows you're running on your Mac. Now you know you're in good hands. Thank you AKG.
customer_reviews.author: CFX

customer_reviews.title: On Its Way Out at a Discounted Price!
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product unopened because my search revealed that it's not being sold by Samsung-US anymore. Also, I wasn't sure if it was compatible with my house of Android since the box clearly stated "by Samsung / Made for iPhone, iPad and iPod. Ultimately, there's a newer M2 model for us Android users.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I cannot justify an overprice $200+ headphone, it doesn't fit my lifestyle. I return it before I open the inner package. It was part of the Cyber Monday deal on Amazon that I must buy my Samsung NOTE10 with this. I hope to get my refund soon. I cannot imagine why would anyone carry a heavy, bulky headset while traveling?
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great, deep sound
customer_reviews.text: Sounds better than the $1,100 worth of Sonos in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: shaun mulreed

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these, bought 4 s10 plus and one note 10 plus and got these free with our phones, everyone loves them. Easy to use, sounds awsome
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Only had these for a couple weeks and the left side broke!
customer_reviews.text: As the headline says I didn't have these for very long before they became practically worthless for me. I had set them down on my desk for a couple minutes and when I put them back on the left side wasn't working anymore! No sound or noise cancelling at all! Given how long these did not last it was not worth the money at all and I won't be going through this brand anymore. For how expensive they were you'd think they wouldn't be so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stand the test of time
customer_reviews.text: Like most of the reviewers, I have always loved AKG but these are subpar. After about 3 months of fairly light use, the left earphone makes popping and crackling noises that give me a headache. That combined with the high pitch frequency emitted for the noise cancelling makes them pretty unusable. Straight out of the box they were alright, but they went downhill fast. AKG just diesnt make the quality priducts they used to, or unloaded these for cheap knowing they weren't good.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Barely used, but they quit working about 6 months after purchase. Won't turn on, won't charge. When they worked they were excellent, now they're landfill filler. I wish Amazon would handle manufacturer warranty issues. It would make fixing/replacing them better.
customer_reviews.author: Capt.Kira

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Despite reading many negative reviews I still purchased these headphones. Let me tell you they do not disappoint, the noise cancellation is amazing. Couldn’t hear my girlfriend sitting right next to me, no engine noise or annoying children screaming while flying. Only have charged it once since delivery still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Alot of things to love except two
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pleased with these headphones overall. The battery life is decent. The sound quality is great as long as you keep the volume on the lower side. One thing I didn't expect was the distortion you get when cranking these to Max volume. One of the drivers would also rattle Abit on bass notes at higher volumes. If this is an issue isolated to my set then these are a steal at 99 dollars. Certainly wouldn't pay full price for them if these issues were a common thing.
customer_reviews.author: Devonte R Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Purchased twice used, both broke within 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They are comfortable, sound amazing, and the noise cancelling is pretty good. The downside is that I had to buy them used, and I can only assume that's why the two pairs that I bought both broke in the same way and in the same time frame. Within 2-3 weeks of constant use, and seemingly when the battery goes below 20%, the left headphone dies and doesn't work no matter what I do. I would avoid purchasing these as used.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Worth for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of it. After I compare it with my roommates’ Bose QC35 and Sony 1000xm3, I got the following results. 1. It got the best sound quality. 2. Good comfort levels 3. The worst noise cancellation, but acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Gave them as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my daughter as a gift for Christmas. She is wearing them all the time. She loves that they cancel out all other noise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I listen to them hands free for playing music, cooking, or cleaning. The sound is good, and I don't have to carry the phone around. They are easy to operate and have a long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Had an old set of noise cancelling headphones that I used on long flights. These turned out to be a great replacement. Extremely comfortable and great sound. The case is a little large, but I can put up with that.
customer_reviews.author: gp

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. They’re pretty comfortable, but kinda weird. The headband can either be toward the back, or the front of my head. They kinda feel weird either way. I wish they weren’t so angled, but they’re pretty nice overall. I downloaded an equalizer app that made a pretty big difference, but they sound good out of the box. They’re pretty light, and the battery lasts a long time. The Bluetooth connection works great, no hiccups, and it connects right away.
customer_reviews.author: A/V Pro

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to say I was pretty disappointed with the sound quality, apparantly I was comparing it to my wireless Bose earbuds and unexpectedly those had better sound quality than these over the ear headphones. the headphones are very nice and sleek I'm not sure how well the battery life is because I returned them, didn't keep for very long. Don't feel the quality was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Grant

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, sturdy design.
customer_reviews.text: While noise cancellation works as a white noise filter most of the time, it does work wonders. You could leave them on and listen to what sounds like rain whenever they're not receiving audio. A solid pair of headphones that I've been using every day with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowspy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working <6 months
customer_reviews.text: Would have been great headphones if they didnt completely fry themselves in less than 6 months of owning them. Really disappointed, I thought AKG would stand behind their product more. Going to look into warranty as it is now outside of Amazons return policy window.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After 2 or charges in 3 months, these just stopped working. They will not turn on at all. Of course the return window is expired so I have no idea how to get a replacement or if I just have to eat this. They were decent headphones and comparable to a pair of Bose QC35 when they did work.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: Purchased April 5, 2020 - dead, won't power on or charge October 8, 2020
customer_reviews.text: Lightly used and well maintained since purchase. They were working fine, started charging them like normal before going to bed, next morning the charging light was off but the headset wouldn't power on. No power light, no charging light while connected to a charger and no audio when using manually with the included audio cable. They are completely dead.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great upper mid priced headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best I've ever owned. I also got them with my phone so I didn't pay $300+. There are better headphones out there but love mine for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Border

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better then what I expected!!! Sound quality, noise cancelation and build quality is awesome. Couldn't be happier :)
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound, good NC. I like it
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is questionable, but it has beautiful sound, good NC. I like it. It is better than I expected, given the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sharper User

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Used under normal conditions and the cheap plastic cracked. Shod have spent a bit more and bought the Sony WH-1000XM4.
customer_reviews.author: Texastentialist

customer_reviews.title: Label your versions.  European or American. Couldn't tell
customer_reviews.text: Could be better. But I got dupped. I thought this was the newest model. Couldn't tell which was from generation
customer_reviews.author: cruzade

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't seem to run out unless I use them wirelessly for the whole day, the sound quality is spectacular and crisp, the Bluetooth range is exceptional and most importantly the option of going from complete noise canceling to being able to have a full conversation with the push of a button is just slick. Love this pair of headphones. I can't believe they're only 100 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Peters

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So, after 2 weeks of usage, the right headband adjustment no longer latches properly. both sides seem to be bent in a way that prevents the notches from locking in place. i am constantly adjusting them to keep them both level. it seems that the speakers have a rattle with certain bass tones. it was nice for the price but i am concerned that with regular usage, the product may just fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable headphones that sound great, the anc wasn't too disorienting either
customer_reviews.author: Vail Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancelation is a neat feature, especially the ambient mode. Overall; satisfied with my new headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jr from KC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They came with a broken charging port, pretty pathetic considering the cost! Hopefully the replacement will be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the crack on both side of the headphone
customer_reviews.text: Both side of the headphone is crack already and there just a few months old. Sound quality i like but the crack is not good as the all. Would like to know about replacement.
customer_reviews.author: linton foster

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think you it would be hard to find it's equal. The noise cancelling may not be on the level of other models but it does work. Sound is great and app AKG app is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Scott Godsey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sounds and over all quality of this AKG N 700. However, after a month of use I noticed cracks on them even through I used it very carefully. I always curried it in the case. Now, just today, I found out that they just stop working! I paid for them $350 and for that price I expect a great quality. Very disappointed. Will not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Left side not working in a few months later on !!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought a few months and use a few times now I just found that left side doesn’t work !!!! I don’t know why then I try to search reviews that why !!! Isn’t only me . What can I do ?
customer_reviews.author: R. Lapinsee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item as a holiday gift for my son and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: LEM

customer_reviews.title: These things suck
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY I ordered them 4 months ago and the won't charge now and won't connect either with Bluetooth or headphone jack and I can't even return them now! Piece of junk! Don't ever buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Bement

customer_reviews.title: For people looking for good sounds but OK with some small flaws
customer_reviews.text: At 99 bucks. It’s an absolute steal. The sound quality is close to the best you can get for Bluetooth headphones. Noise canceling is decent enough. There are some functionality problems like BT connectivity and codec support. I think that’s why it has little popularity. Personally, they just don’t bother me and it fits my use case so well.
customer_reviews.author: Yuanhang Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life & low quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend to my friends. Short battery life not great sound quality. Go better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amon

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Very good 👍 once I found out how to use this product they have since been my go to listening device.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Carey

customer_reviews.title: Fine headphones but kinda cheaply made for 300$
customer_reviews.text: They worked fine. I got two pairs. The first pair stopped working after a couple months. Not a ton of use. The second pair is still going, but on both pairs, the band cracked on one side. So now it doesn't extend or cup the head properly. The plastic cracked.
customer_reviews.author: ATechMan131

customer_reviews.title: Move along, move along.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to connect them to my pc for gaming, but I could never get the mic to work. They're nice other than that. Not sure if they're worth the price being asked.
customer_reviews.author: Infamousbb48

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good and it is very convenient to carry, but I do n’t know if it malfunctions, so the battery life is very short
customer_reviews.author: barye

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: My Dad loves them! They are so much liter than the previous brand he had.
customer_reviews.author: Bridge Waters

customer_reviews.title: A better set than bose
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable how much these eliminate noises. It works with amazingly clear and quality Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This headphone does not work with Mac!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why can’t I pair this headphone with my Mac? It’s totally unacceptable! But I still keep it because the great sound and the noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Machine & Love

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Ok features but not for the price you pay Noise cancelling wasn't as good as other leading brands sound quality is pretty good. Battery life compared to other headphones is okay overall good but not for $300
customer_reviews.author: Dovid

customer_reviews.title: Quit working within 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: Will not take a charge right out of the box. Volume control never worked and would not pair with the phone. We were specifically looking for AKG and thought we had found a great low price. Now we know they are just trying to off load shoddy merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: noise cancelling not up to par with the cost
customer_reviews.text: the noise cancelling on these is NOT up to par with the cost. A cheap, 60 dollar pair of Cowin headphones matched them for cancelling. We'll be returning these and getting the sony WH-1000XM3 ones- online comparitive reviewers give it much better marks.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Battery life poor. Package was already opened and cannot charge or turn on. Might have been a return being sold as a new product. Beware of company selling it.
customer_reviews.author: David Bwalya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delivery by Amazon was on time. Also the sound quality and product seem awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Paras Sharma

customer_reviews.title: nice headphone
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, works perfectly and the battery lasts too long
customer_reviews.author: Hellen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these to talk to people on the phone and so far like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent audio head set. Perfect sound and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good product but quit charging after two months
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed these headphones. Although they don't seem to be charging now after two months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Owensby

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, light weight comfortable. Right side went out after about 20 hrs of play.
customer_reviews.author: Tkownsit

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of sporadic use, the headphones stopped working suddenly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Pérez Baos

customer_reviews.title: Akg
customer_reviews.text: I.liked the style but i had to return it for another 1 bc only 1 side was working
customer_reviews.author: EDDY

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with its case.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and works fine but when received the headphones and I opened it the case was not in it
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Campuzano

customer_reviews.title: broke after six months
customer_reviews.text: loved them but they will not recharge after just 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: cz

customer_reviews.title: The noise cancellation works
customer_reviews.text: It's good for when you don't want to hear anything besides for what your listening to
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This one is cheaper than the one that selling in China
customer_reviews.author: Zicheng Zhai

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for $99
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible headphones for $99, the noise cancelling is not that good and the battery life is about half that of the top headphones. But the audio quality is excellent which IS the most important part of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: NavH

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing headphones and good bass.  Great upgrade from akg loving it!!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried these out sound is amazing!! I am a little nervous about taking these headphones out since I live in la and these are so nice!! I had another akg and decided to upgrade. It's probably fine to use it on the bus they are just too nice since I'm in la I dont want them stolen . Sometimes i can hear really loud people over my music like my neighbor and it really annoys me. Or at the gym. These are just really great. I'd probably want to ware them all the time if it wasnt so much! If u mix with protools u need a adapter and use the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C. HTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Must be good... my daughter can't hear me speak anymore
customer_reviews.text: these are for my 16yo daughter, she appears to like them considering they are on her head 24hrs a day and now ignores every word i say... guess the noise cancelling portion works
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hartman

customer_reviews.title: I have owned both the MDR100x and these
customer_reviews.text: I have owned both Sony's MDR1000x and these heapdhones. The build quality of these headphones is a lot better. The headphones are made of metal instead of plastic for the most critical parts. My Sony's broke after 8 month of use around the hinge. From I read this happens to be incredibly common, this have not updated this design in later versions. The one downside of these is battery life is meh but I would rather have durable heapdhones than amazing battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Lovely operatic and orchestral sound!!
customer_reviews.text: After setting the AKG headphones up and connecting them via bluetooth to my IPad and Galaxy phone, I could not be more pleased with the quality of the sound that emerges. I have worn them 30-45 minutes without discomfort. They are a little loose, so I have to refrain from leaning too far forward and from rapid head movements.
customer_reviews.author: WilNCope

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional Sound Quality!!!!!!! Just no Bass. So I had to return them. I'm not a fan of Beats by Dre or anything like that. But I do need a little bass. It was a deal breaker for me. But by far the best noise cancelling headphones I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Dijon822

customer_reviews.title: Nice noice cancellation headphone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for workplace, this is a nicely designed headphone with excellent noise cancellation tech that met all my needs in a big office, the only con is the case is relatively large.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Tang

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and build from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great, and cancels noise wonderfully. Build is superb. For battery life, I can’t comment since I never listen music more than couple of hrs at a time. But I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: NHK

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones got them as a gift for my son and he loves them. Teenager using them on he said they are lasting about 3 days before needing a charge. Mind untouchable he is wearing them constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4-5 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: Very average headphones. After about 4-5 months of light use the headphones stopped working and they won't turn. The sound quality is good and the noise canceling is ok at best.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bove

customer_reviews.title: Free with my Note 10+
customer_reviews.text: Sounds Amazing, haven't tried the noise cancelling yet. Cant wait to fly with the babies.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Mac.....
customer_reviews.text: Does not connect with iMac or Macbooks as bluetooth tech is different, extremely disappointing to find that out only once received and tested. Sound quality ok, but not outstanding. Bought it for 99.99USD, at that price it is a no brainer
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Short Cord
customer_reviews.text: The relatively short cord appears to be some sort of special cord, as I've attempted to use two other (brand new) cords and neither of them was able to transmit any sound.
customer_reviews.author: Duane M. Zamrok

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancelling, but don’t wear it for TOO long
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Great noise cancellation and battery life. Arrived quickly. I took off one star because the comfort is okay. After a while your head will hurt due to how tight it is.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I don't use them often but the sound is great
customer_reviews.author: Corinne A

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Headphone is good, but only headphone is in box, i didn't get the accessory, like charger cable and cord,
customer_reviews.author: WuYu

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I personally like the headphone, but there's one thing you need to know before purchase.... There's no way to know the battery level (no numerical display)...
customer_reviews.author: Steven Zhu

product_meta.title: Samsung AKG N700NC Over-Ear Foldable Wireless Bluetooth Headphones, Active Noise Cancelling Headphones - Silver (US Version)
product_meta.description: Experience a first class listening experience with Grammy winning, studio quality sound. Hear only what you want, whether you’re listening to a book, catching some sleep on the plane or taking a call on the street. Tune out background noise or control how much you let in. Made with memory foam ear cushions, a padded adjustable headband and a 20 hour battery life, you can listen for hours in comfort and style. And a flat, foldable design lets you stream, listen, or make and take calls on the go.
feature_bullets: First class adaptive noise cancelling technology
Flat foldable in a premium portable package
Crystal clear calls and chats at the touch of a button
Full control of the settings via the AKG headphones App
Equipped with a full set of accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars451 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Airplane adapter, 3.5MM audio cable with 1 button remove & mic, Carrying pouch, Micro USB charging cable
